name: Dhabit
desc: Owner of "Mimisbrunnr Books," who seeks out some new investment ventures.

customize.name: Investment Coupon
customize.desc:
A coupon purchased from Mimisbrunnr Books.
Can be used to tabulate one's investment returns once a week from Dhabit, the bookstore owner.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: The Legends of Reed Miller, Thief Extraordinaire (I)
customize.desc: An anthology of pulp fiction stories based on the exploits of Reed Miller that is wildly popular throughout Nod-Krai. Collated from various works and authors, the veracity of the stories within is as dubious as the quality of the paper they are printed on.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: The Legends of Reed Miller, Thief Extraordinaire (II)
customize.desc: An anthology of pulp fiction stories based on the exploits of Reed Miller that is wildly popular throughout Nod-Krai. Collated from various works and authors, the veracity of the stories within is as dubious as the quality of the paper they are printed on.

customize.name: Mora

customize.name: The Legends of Reed Miller, Thief Extraordinaire (III)
customize.desc: An anthology of pulp fiction stories based on the exploits of Reed Miller that is wildly popular throughout Nod-Krai. Collated from various works and authors, the veracity of the stories within is as dubious as the quality of the paper they are printed on.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Conch Echoes (I)
customize.desc: A tale passed down in this land since the earliest times, telling of children who spoke bearing conch shells in the empty frontier wastelands. The original author has long since been forgotten...

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Mora

customize.name: Investment Coupon
customize.desc:
A coupon purchased from Mimisbrunnr Books.
Can be used to tabulate one's investment returns once a week from Dhabit, the bookstore owner.

customize.name: Investment Returns
customize.desc: Returns from one's investment in the portfolio promoted at Mimisbrunnr Books. All investments involve risks, and profit and loss are both common in the industry, but it would seem that generous returns are always an attractive prospect.
